WordPress.org 上的插件在供应链攻击中存在后门https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/plugins-on-wordpressorg-backdoored-in-supply-chain-attack/ Tue, 25 Jun 2024 15:25:54 -0400比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/plugins-on-wordpressorg-backdoored-in-supply-chain-attack/ A threat actor modified the source code of at least five plugins hosted on WordPress.org to include malicious PHP scripts that create new accounts with administrative privileges on websites running them. Polyfill.io JavaScript 供应链攻击影响超过 10 万个网站https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/polyfillio-javascript-supply-chain-attack-impacts-over-100k-sites/ Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:10:18 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯SecurityGoogle https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/polyfillio-javascript-supply-chain-attack-impacts-over-100k-sites/ Over 100,000 sites have been impacted in a supply chain attack by the Polyfill.io service after a Chinese company acquired the domain and the script was modified to redirect users to malicious and scam sites. P2PInfect 僵尸网络利用新的勒索软件模块瞄准 REdis 服务器https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/p2pinfect-botnet-targets-redis-servers-with-new-ransomware-module/ Tue, 25 Jun 2024 06:00:00 -0400比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/p2pinfect-botnet-targets-redis-servers-with-new-ransomware-module/ P2PInfect, originally a dormant peer-to-peer malware botnet with unclear motives, has finally come alive to deploy a ransomware module and a cryptominer in attacks on Redis servers. 化学设施警告 CISA CSAT 违规可能导致数据被盗https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/chemical-facilities-warned-of-possible-data-theft-in-cisa-csat-breach/ Mon, 24 Jun 2024 16:53:18 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/chemical-facilities-warned-of-possible-data-theft-in-cisa-csat-breach/ CISA is warning that its Chemical Security Assessment Tool (CSAT) environment was breached in January after hackers deployed a webshell on its Ivanti device, potentially exposing sensitive security assessments and plans. Android 版 Chrome 测试功能可通过网站安全地验证您的 ID https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/google/chrome-for-android-tests-feature-that-securely-verizes-your-id-with-sites/ Mon, 24 Jun 2024 15:50:00 -0400玛雅克·帕尔玛GoogleSoftware https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/google/chrome-for-android-tests-feature-that-securely-verizes-your-id-with-sites/ Google is testing a new feature called "Digital Credential API" for Chrome on Android that will allow websites to request identity information from mobile wallets using Android's IdentityCredential system. [...]
新攻击利用 MSC 文件和 Windows XSS 漏洞来破坏网络https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-grimresource-attack-uses-msc-files-and-windows-xss-flaw-to-breach-networks/ Mon, 24 Jun 2024 15:03:11 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityMicrosoft https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-grimresource-attack-uses-msc-files-and-windows-xss-flaw-to-breach-networks/ A novel command execution technique dubbed 'GrimResource' uses specially crafted MSC (Microsoft Saved Console) and an unpatched Windows XSS flaw to perform code execution via the Microsoft Management Console. [...]
四名 FIN9 黑客因网络攻击被起诉，造成 7100 万美元损失https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/four-fin9-hackers-indicted-for-cyberattacks-causing-71m-in-losses/ Mon, 24 Jun 2024 13:35:22 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityLegal https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/four-fin9-hackers-indicted-for-cyberattacks-causing-71m-in-losses/ Four Vietnamese nationals linked to the international cybercrime group FIN9 have been indicted for their involvement in a series of computer intrusions that caused over $71 million in losses to companies in the U.S. [...]
